N64 Player

Games will not load if you are not in AUGames fullscreen mode.

Instructions: Select a game from the dropdown list and then select play. You find see controls on the "Remap Buttons" tab.
Games may take up to 1 minute to load. Pressing the play button again will restart the loading time.
